mapper.select: select k.* from kind k join user_kind uk on k.kind_id = uk.kind_id where uk.user_id = #{userId}

select s.section_id, s.section_name from section s join (select a.section_id, sum(a.score) as sum from user_answer ua join answer a on ua.answer_id = a.answer_id where ua.user_id = #{userId} group by a.section_id order by sum desc limit 3 ) as top on s.section_id = top.section_id
